title: Google Pixel 3 XL Repair Support
content:
Hello!
My Pixel 3 XL does not boot after OTA update.
I've been trying to reach out to USA Google support, but 24/7 I see only:
""Phone support is currently closed." and ""Chat support is currently not available."

After entering IMEI on https://store.google.com/us/repaircenter page I see, that device is under warranty.
How I can return Pixel 3 XL for a repair service to Google?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
